main.name: Shafay Ahmed
main.description: Strong business and software development professional with a Bachelor of Science - BS focused in Computer Science from Georgia Institute of Technology.
main.bio: Experienced Co-Founder with a demonstrated history of working in the computer software industry. Skilled in NodeJS, React, Java, and python.
main.contactmessage: Don't be afraid to reach out, I don't bite!

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Georgia Tech provides a technologically focused education to more than 25,000 undergraduate and graduate students in fields ranging from engineering, computing, and sciences, to business, design, and liberal arts.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Worked on a Single Page Application with React and Node for 6,000 employees for First Data Client Services. Worked with a team of Engineers and Project Managers over the 10 weeks to complete sprints and reach deadlines.

work.title: Co-Founder
work.description: Created a NLP application to analyze different forms of Social Media for stock influencers. In addition, created a platform to display data for clients for investment purposes.

projects.title: Medulla Analytics
projects.category: My startup that I teamed up with CreateX from Georgia Tech

projects.title: First Data Merchant Star Access Web Application
